attributes.action: To have child maintenance calculated after tax
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, petition for the calculation of child maintenance payments to be based on after-tax income. Current methods use gross income, which does not reflect the actual financial situation of non-custodial parents. This can create undue hardship and prevent fair compliance. By adjusting to after-tax calculations, we promote fairness, improve co-parenting relationships, and ensure children receive adequate support.
attributes.background: I believe child maintenance payment shouldnt be calculated before tax deductions but after

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700259
